name: Light the Silence (10 Games in 10 Weeks)
name_original: Light the Silence (10 Games in 10 Weeks)
description:
Light the Silence is an exploration-based game where you need to make noise in order to see! 

Illuminate the darkness by snapping your fingers, ringing bells, and lighting torches as you discover landmarks and piece together what happened, both to them and to you.

This is the third entry into my 10 Games in 10 Weeks challenge.  Follow me on Twitter for daily progress updates!
